Summary: saw a bright light thought it was star got closer lookup triabgle over head pulled over it slowly moved away then i couldnt see it anymore till later when i was driving
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving on highway 75 thought it was to bright to be a star star three white lights one at each end of angle then when plasma looking red light it moved very slowly when it wasnt dead stopped i was scared....i pulled over with two other ppl and watched it move away i had to keep driving traffic was going to get bad but after that about 3 miles away i could see it again still moving helicopters were flying around it and there was more than topeka has...must have been fort riley's..somthing was up
